snippet: The winner of last year’s American Contract Bridge League youth master point race for players under 20 was Adam Kaplan of New Port Richey, Fla.
abstract: Phillip Alder Bridge column discusses a deal played at the American Contract Bridge League Bermuda Regional.
lead_paragraph: The winner of last year’s American Contract Bridge League youth master point race for players under 20 was Adam Kaplan of New Port Richey, Fla.
